resources.string: Your location data is required to show your current location on map. Again if you want the donor to come to your current location your location data is also required. Your location data is only kept until donation session remains, afterwards this data is removed from database
You have permanently denied location permission. Go to settings to grant permission
* Please enter the email you registered with. We will send a password reset link to that email. If you cannot remember your email please contact our support team.
